headline: BALZERS-PFEIFFER TURBO PUMP 180 L/S
description: Turbo Pump - Wide range turbo pump
keywords: turbomolecular pump turbo pumps turbos drag pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Turbo Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Balzers-Pfeiffe
Model TPH 180H
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 180.0 l/s (381.4 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 7.50E-9(En) torr (10.00E-9 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 100.0 mm (3.937 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Controller Included No
Cables Included No
Bearing Type Ceramic
Rotational Speed 50,000 RPM
Startup Time 4 minutes
External Cooling Water Cooled
Other Information Part No.: PMP01570
Non-wearing permanent magnet bearing on high-vacuum side
Lubricated ball bearing on fore vacuum side
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.858 in (22.5 cm)
Height 10.630 in (27.0 cm)
Weight 23 lb (10 kg)
